content.raw:
@akiHonda , I just checked your machine and saw that below the messages you posted, there is this one:

`Unable to find image 'fcomputer:latest' locally`

This means CloudSim failed to build your docker image, so it can't run it. Running `docker images` I can't see an image called `fcomputer`, which is the one CloudSim builds from your files.

You can take a look at `~/code/cloudsim.log`, there is a lot of information there.
content.html:
@akiHonda , I just checked your machine and saw that below the messages you posted, there is this one:

Unable to find image 'fcomputer:latest' locally

This means CloudSim failed to build your docker image, so it can't run it. Running docker images I can't see an image called fcomputer, which is the one CloudSim builds from your files.

You can take a look at ~/code/cloudsim.log, there is a lot of information there.
